QuestData.Title: Father's Footsteps
QuestData.Description: Yes, the boy's father - Sentinel Ku-Yao - has gone missing. He could be any number of places... we have no shortage of enemies these days.$b$bYou're free to look around, if you wish. You might start by looking for his yak, or by asking Sentinel Yalo what he knows.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Father's Bedroll, Father's Shield, Ha-Cha, and Sentinel Yalo.
QuestData.RewardText: No shield, no crossbow, no yak... something bad has happened to dad.
